title: Vice President Biden hosts conference calls with governors and local official to discuss Recovery act implementation | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 25, 2009

 



Vice President Biden hosts conference calls with governors and local official to discuss Recovery act implementation




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Vice President  _______________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                    June 25, 2009    VICE PRESIDENT BIDEN HOSTS CONFERENCE CALLS   WITH GOVERNORS AND LOCAL OFFICIALS TO DISCUSS RECOVERY ACT IMPLEMENTATION  Earlier today, the Vice President hosted two conference calls with Governors and Mayors/County Executives from across the country to discuss implementation of the Recovery Act. The following elected officials participated: GOVERNORS:  Governor Phil Bredesen (D-TN) Governor Jay Nixon (D-MO) Governor Deval Patrick (D-MA)  MAYORS / COUNTY EXECUTIVES:  Mayor Fred Armstrong (D – Columbus, IN)   Mayor Cory Booker (D – Newark, NJ)   Mayor Dick Moccia (R – Norwalk, CT)   Mayor Carl Redus, Jr. (D – Pine Bluff, AR)   County Commissioner Ann Schroeder (D – Franklin County, MO)     ### ---
